Step 1: Install ChatGPT Sugar
Step 2: Login into ChatGPT, then click 'Discover Your Journey with ChatGPT' button

ChatGPT Sugar is an open-source Chrome extension designed to enrich your interactions with ChatGPT. It seamlessly integrates into your ChatGPT experience, adding a suite of tools that make your conversations more engaging and insightful.

Source code: https://github.com/yaozhiwang/chatgpt-sugar
